data.name: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby Demo
data.detailed_description:
Start Your Engines.

Are you ready to enter the gladiatorial arena of Crush Zone? If so, bring your A-game, because only one champion will claim the grand prize. To survive, you must do whatever it takes: slam rivals into walls, hurl them into lethal traps, or send them flying from their cars with the sheer force of your vehicle. And don’t forget—your customized ride is loaded with powerful weapons that could turn the tide of battle.

The "Scenic Route"

Within the demo, contestants can jump into the free-for-all mode, either solo or with friends via local split-screen multiplayer. (Steam Remote Play Together supported!)

The Destination

In future updates, You'll be able to experience Crush Zone at full throttle levels, which include:
  • Campaign: Follow the story of Gearhead, a daring driver out to overthrow the corrupt host, Elizabeth Austin.
  • Online Multiplayer: Where you battle it out with friends, or this random guy that queued up at 3am on a Sunday night. . . But online.
  • Additional Arenas: Many more ways to be eliminated by the environment rather than other contestants.
  • Additional Game Modes: The crowd wants more. So we shall give them more.

What are you waiting for?

Join the Crush Zone games today, and rise up in the ranks to be the champion that you're destined to be.

data.short_description: Enter the arena and experience fast-paced, arcade-style vehicular combat. Wield powerful weapons, use the environment to your advantage, or simply smash your way to victory in Crush Zone—where only the strongest survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x64 CPU with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core x64
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 1GB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All.

data.name: MY TIME ALIVE
data.detailed_description:
In 2023, industry leading pharmaceutical company "HT Pharmaceuticals" found the complete cure for COVID-19, and they released the vaccine to the public. The virus made healthy humans into flesh eating monsters within seconds of the infection, but could only be spread through bite or blood consumption. 9 months later, mankind is scattered into smaller pockets spread across the world, while the rest of the world is abandoned and roamed by the infected. The original outbreak occurred in New York. Before the infection, you were the lead scientist who worked on the project for HT Pharmaceuticals, so you understand how it functions. Towards the end of the project, you retired very rich. Now you are part of a small group of survivors who live deep in the city, struggling to survive. Complete supply missions and conduct research studies to help find the cure to the infection.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Features:

-Full voice acting in a story rich, singleplayer experience

-Along the way, meet different characters and see how their journey pans out

-Find the cure to save what's left of humanity...

And much more...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Check the community hub for more information regarding release. Thanks!

data.short_description: In 2023, industry leading pharmaceutical company "HT Pharmaceuticals" found the complete cure for COVID-19, and they released the vaccine to the public. 9 months later, not much is left of mankind. Complete supply missions and conduct research studies to help find the cure to the infection.

highlighted.name: Meet the rest of the team.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence, and some blood and gore.

data.name: Kanamono
data.detailed_description:
Overview


"Kanamono" is a 2D side-scrolling shooting game.
We aim to clear all 6 stages + challenge mode.
You can make a powerful attack by using the scraps that come out when you destroy the enemy, or you can make a shield that prevents the enemy's attack.
You can get a high score by destroying many enemies and scraps within a certain period of time.

Story


Mankind was invaded by mechanical creatures that emerged from space.
Mankind surrendered to the overwhelming power of mechanical creatures and lived an inconvenient but peaceful life.
However, such peace was about to end.

Keyboard operation method


z: Shot
x: Bomb
Esc: Pause

Shot
Press once to fire a several bullets straight.
Hold down the shot button fire a wide range of bullets.
Hold down, player's move speed slow down.

Bomb
Hold down the bomb button absorb enemy scrap.
With 1 or more scrap absorbed, release the bomb button to fire the bomb.
When absorbing scrap, you can create a shield that protects against enemy bullets only once.

Pause
Display the pause menu.

Combo





When destroy enemies and scraps, "Combo Count" start.
Destroy enemies and scraps during Combo Count, combo will be added.
After certain period of time, Combo Count ends and get score based on the number of combo.
The Combo Count stop while absorbing scrap.
The Combo Count does not end while the bomb remains.(Combo Count advances)

Shield


If the shield hits an enemy bullet, it will explode and damage the enemy.


technique with a shield.
scraps cannot be destroyed while absorbing.
So, by hitting the enemy's bullets while pressing the absorb button in the shield state, you can collect scraps while destroying the enemy.

Option


  • Full screen ON / OFF can be set. Also change it with Alt + Enter.
  • Default resolution is 640x480. Black frame is displayed except for multiples of this.
  • If the frame rate is abnormally fast, turn off VSync.
  • Turn it on Upload score, it will be auto uploaded to the Steam leaderboard when the score is updated.

Other


  • Difficulty is Normal and Hard.
  • You can increase initial life.
  • You can take a screenshot with the q key.

data.short_description: Destroy your enemies and use the scraps that come out to destroy them even more! Side-scrolling space fantasy shooting game, that is "Kanamono".

data.name: Swoon! Earth Escape
data.detailed_description:
The planet is flooded with a mysterious green acid. Help Swoon and the rest of the crew escape the Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship and face the most daring bosses in this epic retro-style journey!
• Play 5 different worlds in 2.5D and 3D, travel from the adventurous Jurassic Island to the glowy Sci-Fi world!
• Unlock new wearable suits from your Garage, learn skills like Roll, Swirl and Path Builder. Put on the Adventure, Snow, Steampunk and Sci-Fi suits and switch between them to kill enemies, solve puzzles or build alternate paths.
• Explore, collect mechanical parts, gems and keys to unlock new game features.
• Save all your friends and get ready to leave planet Earth!
data.about_the_game:
The planet is flooded with a mysterious green acid. Help Swoon and the rest of the crew escape the Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship and face the most daring bosses in this epic retro-style journey!

• Unlock new wearable suits from your Garage, learn skills like Roll, Swirl and Path Builder. Put on the Adventure, Snow, Steampunk and Sci-Fi suits and switch between them to kill enemies, solve puzzles or build alternate paths.
• Explore, collect mechanical parts, gems and keys to unlock new game features.
